output:

    theme: lumen
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```




```{r, echo=F}
library(readxl)
library(DT)
data <- read_excel("data.xlsx", sheet = "尺度・略語まとめ（掲載用）")

datatable(data[,1:2],
          options=list(pageLength = 50,
                       autoWidth = TRUE,
                       columnDefs = list(
                  list(width = '200px', targets = c(1:2)))))
```
